TenderNotice.title: Notice Inviting e-Tender

tenderDetails.nameOfWork: Repairing and maintenance of sewerage line and septic tank including dismantling of old C.I. pipe lines & fitting of new P.V.C. pipes for staff quarter and boys hostel at NIT Agartala.

TenderNotice.invitedFrom: Central & State Sector Undertakings / Enterprises and eligible Contractors / Firms / Agencies of appropriate class registered with state PWDs / CPWD / MES Railway / P & T or other registered firms.

biddingProcess.instructions: Bidding is online only. Physical submission of bids is not permitted. Bids once submitted cannot be modified.

bidOpening.process: Bids will be opened online and will be accessible to bidders through https://eprocure.gov.in. Bidders may be present at the bid opening.

additionalInfo.corrigendumNote: Any subsequent corrigendum will be available on the website only.
